page.title: 06 MANOR FARM
page.content: Manor Farm is similar to the other farms at the estate.It is managed by Colin Hilsden on behalf of the estate (which was sold on July 12th 1985). It is 412 acres in size and is a mixed farm.Crops grown are Winter Wheat,Winter Barley, Winter oats, Spring Barley and peas for fodder.Stock consists of 450 ewes and 105 cattle-50 Fresians heifers for breeding purposes and the rest are Beef.The age of the farm is uncertain but some labourers cottages are dated 1879.It is not thought that the sale of the estate will bring about any changes to the management of this farm. Public footpaths exist across the farm but at present are overgrown.
